attributes.action: 2 speed bumps to be put in Ladyfield Road, Chippenham
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to have 2 speed bumps put in Ladyfield Road, Chippenham, Wiltshire.

As a result of many people breaking the speed limit on this street, there have been numerous collisions with parked cars, other drivers and many cats being ran over and killed.

If 2 speed bumps were to be put down this street it would effectively:

- Decrease the amount of collisions with parked cars
- Decrease the amount of collisions with other drivers
- Decrease the amount of cats and other animals being hurt/killed
- Decrease the risk of pedestrians being hurt/killed

I believe this is an urgent and important problem that should not be ignored. We should not have to wait until a person is seriously injured or worse before we take action.

So please sign this petition and make our roads safer.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Wiltshire County Council.
